original_text: Everyone had as much as they needed. Some believers had land or houses, which belonged to them. They sold those things and then they took the money to the apostles.
korean_text: 그 중에 가난한 사람이 없으니 이는 밭과 집 있는 자는 팔아 그 판 것의 값을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: Everyone had as much as they needed.
Some believers had land or houses,
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 신자들은 땅이나 집을 가지고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: and then they took the money
